amendment.description: Amendment provides for the establishment of a Children's Safety Office within the Department of Justice under the general authority of the Attorney General.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in the Congressional Record to provide for establishment of a Children's Safety Office under the general authority of the Attorney General.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Conyers.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
